unnormalised: Hey! Solar rooftop subsidies are awesome! My cousin Priya in Chennai got one. Reduced her electricity bill drastically - almost Rs. 2000 per month! Heard the MNRE is pushing this hard. Thinking of getting it installed before Diwali. Wondering if it'll handle the load of all those festive lights! Maybe I'll celebrate Onam with some crispy dosa, powered by the sun. Anyone else from IIT Madras tried this?
normalised: Hey! Solar rooftop subsidies are awesome! My cousin Priya in Chennai got one. Reduced her electricity bill drastically - almost two thousand rupees per month! Heard the M N R E is pushing this hard. Thinking of getting it installed before Diwali. Wondering if it'll handle the load of all those festive lights! Maybe I'll celebrate Onam with some crispy dosa, powered by the sun. Anyone else from I I T Madras tried this?
